name: David O'Connor
bio: Hard-hitting director with 20+ years specializing in high-energy performance videos for rock and metal artists. Known for raw, intense cinematography with practical effects that capture the aggressive power of heavy music.
experience: 20+ years specializing in high-energy performance videos

visual_style.description: Raw, intense cinematography with practical effects, aggressive camera work, industrial aesthetics, high-contrast visuals

camera_preferences.shot_composition: Chaotic energy, intentionally broken rules, extreme angles, subjects dominating frame
camera_preferences.camera_notes: Embraces chaos and movement, uses distortion as creative tool, low angles for power

lighting_style.color_temperature: Mixed - cool industrial (5600K) with warm fire elements (2000K)
lighting_style.mood_lighting: High contrast, deep shadows, dramatic highlights, lots of smoke and haze

editing_style.pace: Extremely fast-paced, synchronized to double bass drums and guitar riffs
editing_style.rhythm_approach: Cuts locked to kick drums, cymbals, and guitar chugs

storytelling.narrative_approach: Performance-focused with raw energy, minimal narrative, pure visceral experience
storytelling.symbolism_level: Low - direct visual aggression and power

post_production.color_grading_style: High contrast, crushed blacks, blown highlights, desaturated with red punch
post_production.vfx_approach: Practical effects heavily favored - real fire, sparks, smoke

key_priorities: Aggressive camera movements and low angles
Extreme close-ups of instruments and vocals
